questionTitle: The position of the larynx, or voice box, in the neck determines ___, swallows, and vocalizes.
anwers: an animal, how does one breathe

questionTitle: Young herons are helpless for a few weeks ___ they learn to fly.
___ angles of any triangle always add up to 180 degrees
Alaskan forests ___ five or six miles inland from the Pacific coast.
Cosmetics, rarely noted today for any dangerous properties, have been _____ for serious health problems in the past.
The Cubists were concerned with how__________a given subject from different points of view simultaneously.
For the investor who ________ money, silver or bonds are good options.
George would certainly have attended the proceedings ________.
anwers: if he didn't get the flat tire
if his flat tire hadn't happened
had he not had a flat tire
had the tire not flattened itself

questionTitle: The bodies of living creatures are organized into many different systems, each of which has ________ function.
It is the recommendation of many psychologists ________ to associate words and remember names.
anwers: that a learner uses mental images
a learner to use mental images
that a learner use mental images

questionTitle: The crime rate has continued to rise in American cities despite efforts on the part of both government and private citizens to curb ________.

Physical fitness exercises can cause injuries ________ the participants are not careful.
The nuthatch ________ six inches long.

anwers: how much does every car cost
how much are every car cost

questionTitle: The Supreme Court does not hear a case unless ________ , except those involving foreign ambassadors.
